articles.author: HT Sports Desk
articles.title: Gavaskar's crucial advice for under-fire Shubman Gill after red-ball failures - Hindustan Times
articles.description: Sunil Gavaskar had a golden advice for Shubman Gill after the youngster endured yet another Test failure, registering scores of 2 and 26 against South Africa | Cricket
articles.content: Team India conceded a mammoth innings-and-32-run defeat against South Africa in the first Test of the two-match series in Centurion earlier this week. The side endured a disappointing performance wit… [+2054 chars]
